title: Relates to making live organ donors eligible for free health insurance, term life insurance and student loan forgiveness
summary: Relates to making live organ donors eligible for free health insurance, term life insurance and student loan forgiveness.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to making live organ donors eligible for free coverage from family health plus; to amend the insurance law, in relation to providing for a free term life insurance policy for live organ donors; and to amend the education law, in relation to creating a post-graduation tuition assistance program for live organ donors
